titleStmt.title: A compendious history of the Goths, Svvedes, & Vandals, and other northern nations written by Olaus Magnus.
titleStmt.author: Olaus, Magnus, Archbishop of Uppsala, 1490-1557.
Streater, John, fl. 1650-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Streater, and sold by Humphrey Mosely, George Sawbridge, Henry Twiford, Tho. Dring, John Place and Henry Haringman,

notesStmt.note: Pages 33-344 are stained and 7-63 are creased with some loss of text in filmed copy. Beginning-page 135 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library
